Name: SQL - Restore Database
Description: Restore a MS SQL Server database to the file system.

Parameters.Name: Server
Parameters.Label: Server
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the SQL Server instance that the database resides in.

Parameters.Name: Database
Parameters.Label: Database
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the database to restore.

Parameters.Name: BackupDirectory
Parameters.Label: Backup Directory
Parameters.HelpText: The backup directory to retrieve the database backup from.

Parameters.Name: SqlLogin
Parameters.Label: SQL login
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL auth login to connect with. If specified, the SQL Password must also be entered.

Parameters.Name: SqlPassword
Parameters.Label: SQL password
Parameters.HelpText: The password for the SQL auth login to connect with. Only used if SQL Login is specified.

Parameters.Name: Compression
Parameters.Label: Compression Option
Parameters.HelpText:
- 0  -   Use the default backup compression server configuration
- 1  -   Enable the backup compression
- 2  -   Disable the backup compression

Parameters.Name: Devices
Parameters.Label: Devices
Parameters.HelpText: The number of backup devices to use for the backup.

Parameters.Name: Stamp
Parameters.Label: Backup file suffix
Parameters.HelpText: Specify a suffix to add to the backup file names. If left blank the backup will use the current timestamp.
